lexa.core.expression

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.expression.Expression
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assign, Conditional, Element, Function, MultipleExpression, Negative, Not, Value

    public abstract class Expression
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for expression evaluation.
    This class must be implemented by all classes that will support expression evaluation.
    Since:
    2013-03
    Author:
    William

      • evaluate

        public abstract java.lang.Object evaluate(lexa.core.data.DataSet data)
                                   throws ExpressionException
        During evaluation this method is called to determine the value.
        A DataSet provides values for determining the result which is then returned.
        Parameters:
        data - The input to feed the expression.
        Returns:
        The result of the evaluation
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when an error occurs in evaluation the expression

      • parse

        public static Expression parse(java.lang.String expressionText)
                        throws ExpressionException
        Parse a string to form an expression
        This parses the expression using the base function library containing the in built functions.
        Parameters:
        expressionText - a string representing an expression.
        Returns:
        an expression object.
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when the text cannot be parsed
        See Also:
        lexa.core.expression.function

      • parse

        public static Expression parse(java.lang.String expressionText,
                               FunctionLibrary library)
                        throws ExpressionException
        Parse a string to form an expression
        This parses the expression using the supplied function library.
        Parameters:
        expressionText - a string representing an expression.
        library - a function library to support the expression string
        Returns:
        an expression object.
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when the text cannot be parsed
        See Also:
        lexa.core.expression.function

      • expression

        static void expression(ExpressionTokens tokens)
                throws ExpressionException
        Parse the text for an expression 
         EXPRESSION ::= ID "=" ELEMENT
              | LOGICAL_OR
        Parameters:
        tokens - the token list pointing to the start of the expression.
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when the expression cannot be parsed.
